thread.title: If You're Not Living In These 'Hot' Home-Value Zip Codes, You're Missing Out
thread.title_full: If You're Not Living In These 'Hot' Home-Value Zip Codes, You're Missing Out

title: If You're Not Living In These 'Hot' Home-Value Zip Codes, You're Missing Out
text:
If You're Not Living In These 'Hot' Home-Value Zip Codes, You're Missing Out Written by: Brian O'Connell 08/14/15 - 1:16 PM EDT More Headlines What Is President Obama Reading This Summer? 
NEW YORK ( MainStreet ) - Here's a "top 10 list" any homeowner would love to make - Realtor.com's rankings of the ten hottest U.S. residential real estate zip codes . The list, released August 13, ranks homes based on national for-sale listing views as aggregated on Realtor.com, coupled with median age of inventory. Top zip codes all share high marks for healthy housing dynamics, strong employment and neighborhood "it" factors, the company told TheStreet . "Each locale on the list is emblematic of the key trends driving housing this year - healthy local economics, job opportunities and affordability," offers Jonathan Smoke, chief economist for Realtor.com. "For first-time homebuyers, these communities provide great opportunities to enter the housing market, build a career and raise a family; older generations are able to build wealth and enjoy a variety of lifestyles." So which zip codes made the cut? Here's the list: 1
